verbs.description: Ahead of President Trump ’s decision on whether the U.S. [V: would] withdraw from the Iran nuclear deal , on Tuesday , all three network morning shows hyped how “ European allies have desperately tried ” to lobby in favor of the Obama - era agreement . Hosts and correspondents also warned of dire consequences if America left the deal , predicting everything from higher gas prices to Iran
